  </div>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Chuka Umunna added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ChukaUmunna/status/973910106541879296" data-conversation-id="973910106541879296" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="973910106541879296" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ChukaUmunna" data-user-id="33300246" href="/ChukaUmunna/status/973910106541879296" data-conversation-id="973910106541879296" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Chuka Umunna</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ChukaUmunna</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">In the Commons chamber now. There is only one appropriate response to the actions of the Russian Federation on UK soil - nothing less than unequivocal condemnation. I very much welcome the tranche of measures the PM has just announced which have been praised across the House.</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Pat McFadden</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>patmcfaddenmp</b></span></a>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted Donald Tusk</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Welcome statement from Tusk.  Solidarity from the UKs allies is critical at this time.<a href="https://t.co/IjfHILjzSb" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/eucopresident/status/973879393834725376" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/eucopresident/status/973879393834725376"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/eucopresident/</span><span class="invisible">status/973879393834725376</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/eucopresident/status/973879393834725376" data-conversation-id="973879393834725376" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="973879393834725376" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="eucopresident" data-user-id="196994616" href="/eucopresident/status/973879393834725376" data-conversation-id="973879393834725376" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">I express my full solidarity with PM <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></span> in the face of the brutal attack inspired, most likely, by Moscow.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Those who are responsible for the <a href="/hashtag/nervegas?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>nervegas</b></a> attack in <a href="/hashtag/Salisbury?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Salisbury</b></a> in the <a href="/hashtag/UK?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UK</b></a> must see very clearly that there is unequivocal, unwavering and very strong European solidarity with the British people and the British Government.

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thank you Pat McFadden <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> for attending the launch of the Centre for Sikh and Panjabi Studies <a href="/wlv_uni_sikh" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="971393234931941376"><s>@</s><b>wlv_uni_sikh</b></a> , your support has always been brilliant <a href="/wlv_uni" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="40088191"><s>@</s><b>wlv_uni</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ver6HGOFml" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/status/971865427390488576" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/status/971865427390488576"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/</span><span class="invisible">status/971865427390488576</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Dr Opinderjit Takhar added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">With <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="802594322113789952"><s>@</s><b>DrOpinderjit</b></span>, the director of the new Centre for Sikh and Panjabi Studies, and <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="32965648"><s>@</s><b>EmmaReynoldsMP</b></span> at tonights launch. <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great to meet Paul Johnson today, to hear Alfies story and to talk about what we can do to help disabled children in the Black Country.<a href="https://t.co/TVmSlqwpxY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/friendsofalfiej/status/972186667326025729" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/friendsofalfiej/status/972186667326025729"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/friendsofalfie</span><span class="invisible">j/status/972186667326025729</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Congratulations to <a href="/wlv_uni" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="40088191"><s>@</s><b>wlv_uni</b></a> <a href="/DrOpinderjit" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="802594322113789952"><s>@</s><b>DrOpinderjit</b></a> for launching first Centre for Sikh &amp; Punjabi studies <a href="/wlv_uni_sikh" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="971393234931941376"><s>@</s><b>wlv_uni_sikh</b></a> in the U.K. - great to be at launch with <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> and many others this evening<a href="https://t.co/eVBeDeFPYT" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/eVBeDeFPYT</a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">With <a href="/DrOpinderjit" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="802594322113789952"><s>@</s><b>DrOpinderjit</b></a>, the director of the new Centre for Sikh and Panjabi Studies, and <a href="/EmmaReynoldsMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="32965648"><s>@</s><b>EmmaReynoldsMP</b></a> at tonights launch.   Well done to <a href="/wlv_uni_sikh" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="971393234931941376"><s>@</s><b>wlv_uni_sikh</b></a>.<a href="https://t.co/nPnum17dWI" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/nPnum17dWI</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted Wolves Council</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">A very moving funeral service today. A huge turnout and touching tributes from his family, his pastor and his political colleagues.  Goodbye Elias. May you rest in peace.<a href="https://t.co/KbYJ6upAKD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/wolvescouncil/status/971730301650194433" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/wolvescouncil/status/971730301650194433"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/wolvescouncil/</span><span class="invisible">status/971730301650194433</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/apna_heritage/status/970643248690712576" data-conversation-id="970643248690712576" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="970643248690712576" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="apna_heritage" data-user-id="757549099080089600" href="/apna_heritage/status/970643248690712576" data-conversation-id="970643248690712576" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-quadPhoto">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/patmcfaddenmp" data-user-id="25091518">

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Pat McFadden</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>patmcfaddenmp</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">20</span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very interesting report here from <a href="/GlobalFutureCIC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="829665666433183744"><s>@</s><b>GlobalFutureCIC</b></a> on the open/closed divide in politics and society - a divide which cuts across traditional left/right divide, influences attitudes to change and ultimately whether we want to shape the world or retreat from it.<a href="https://t.co/B2zIkflG1p" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/TomBaldwin66/status/968797170836045826" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/TomBaldwin66/status/968797170836045826"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/TomBaldwin66/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/968797170836045826</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Heart warming to see the good and the great of <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> and <a href="/hashtag/TradeUnion?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TradeUnion</b></a> movement come together to pay their respects at St. Paul's Cathedral to the much beloved <a href="/hashtag/MaryTurner?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>MaryTurner</b></a> (the long-standing president of the <a href="/hashtag/GMB?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GMB</b></a> Union).<a href="https://t.co/gwfz8siCax" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/gwfz8siCax</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"Brexit is like giving up a three-course meal... for the promise of a packet of crisps in the future."

Former top civil servant Sir Martin Donnelly says the arithmetic of Brexit just "doesn't add up" <a href="/hashtag/r4today?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>r4today</b></a><a href="https://t.co/EMKDWrA0qH" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/EMKDWrA0qH</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Charles Grant Retweeted Christopher Meyer</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">No, Chris, a customs union has a precise meaning under WTO rules. Either the UK aligns with the EU's commercial policy for goods and/or farm produce, or it doesn't. WTO rules - not Brussels blabber - don't allow a CU for one or a few industries. <a href="/CER_EU" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="233978509"><s>@</s><b>CER_EU</b></a><a href="https://t.co/kWz1SXw1be" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SirSocks/status/966955051003600896" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SirSocks/status/966955051003600896"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SirSocks/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/966955051003600896</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Charles Grant added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/SirSocks/status/966955051003600896" data-conversation-id="966955051003600896" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="966955051003600896" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="SirSocks" data-user-id="127360173" href="/SirSocks/status/966955051003600896" data-conversation-id="966955051003600896" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Christopher Meyer</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>SirSocks</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">There will be a customs agreement/partnership/understanding/area with the EU. But stop calling it a union, because it only causes confusion with the one enshrined in the EU Treaties. That then triggers Brussels blabber about cherry-picking. Semantics have their use.</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

Just listened to wonderful and moving speech from <a href="/JulieElliottMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="776022362"><s>@</s><b>JulieElliottMP</b></a> about her daughter Rebecca who awaits a transplant.</p>

My thoughts are with his family.<a href="https://t.co/R3lpVYnZ6e" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ExpressandStar/status/966959234410835968" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ExpressandStar/status/966959234410835968"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ExpressandStar</span><span class="invisible">/status/966959234410835968</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The death of Councillor Elias Mattu is a huge loss for Wolverhampton.  A fantastic and tireless public servant, he worked so hard for the people of the city, always in a spirit of great generosity and warmth.  We have lost someone very special today.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Due to success of the Apna Heritage Archive Exhibition curators <a href="/WolvArtGallery" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="51065059"><s>@</s><b>WolvArtGallery</b></a> are extending show until Sun, Mar 18. Visitors can get a rare glimpse of 30 years of life captured by Punjabi families across the city from their own photographs and family albums.<a href="https://t.co/aJyw9hxqHR" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/aJyw9hxqHR</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is the key point for former Carillion workers: will they be punished for the company going under<a href="https://t.co/peCTrk7ejC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/status/966326332987727872" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/status/966326332987727872"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/</span><span class="invisible">status/966326332987727872</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Sam Coates Times added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/patmcfaddenmp/status/966326332987727872" data-conversation-id="966326332987727872" aria-hidden="true">

      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Pat McFadden</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>patmcfaddenmp</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">In Carillion debate in Parliament today I argued for Govt to insist on current terms and conditions for Carillion workers who transfer to new suppliers as a result of the companys liquidation.</div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">In Carillion debate in Parliament today I argued for Govt to insist on current terms and conditions for Carillion workers who transfer to new suppliers as a result of the companys liquidation.</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Have you seen <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a>'s 'PMQs: My Verdict' this week? Read more here; <a href="https://t.co/yCWcn6ZkRD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.patmcfadden.com/pmqs_my_verdict_21_02_2018" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.patmcfadden.com/pmqs_my_verdict_21_02_2018"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">patmcfadden.com/pmqs_my_verdic</span><span class="invisible">t_21_02_2018</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/5MoFaYn5CY" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/5MoFaYn5CY</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Good Friday Agreement is owned by the people of Ireland, North and South. It cannot be usurped by any parliament, political party or individual. Now more than ever, the British &amp; Irish Governments must work together - as its guardians - to stand by it &amp; implement it.<a href="https://t.co/jSuCzMVCet" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/jSuCzMVCet</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today the <a href="/ExpressandStar" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="17159441"><s>@</s><b>ExpressandStar</b></a> launches its petition calling for tougher sentences over knife crime<a href="https://t.co/VUXcszrSeO" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.expressandstar.com/news/crime/2018/02/20/it-has-to-stop-es-launches-campaign-for-tougher-sentences-for-knife-crime/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.expressandstar.com/news/crime/2018/02/20/it-has-to-stop-es-launches-campaign-for-tougher-sentences-for-knife-crime/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">expressandstar.com/news/crime/201</span><span class="invisible">8/02/20/it-has-to-stop-es-launches-campaign-for-tougher-sentences-for-knife-crime/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On Friday, <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> visited the APNA Heritage exhibition on local Punjabi history at Wolverhampton Art Gallery. So much given by those who came here back in the 1960s. The exhibition is at the gallery until 18th March.<a href="https://t.co/6lGmURbtnr" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/6lGmURbtnr</a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="964462001819934720" id="stream-item-tweet-964462001819934720" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;964462001819934720&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="964462001819934720" data-item-id="964462001819934720" data-permalink-path="/WolvArtGallery/status/964462001819934720" data-conversation-id="964462001819934720" data-tweet-nonce="964462001819934720-87a1d533-619b-44cb-8775-061f607d3bd0" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="964465244335730688" data-retweeter="patmcfaddenmp" data-screen-name="WolvArtGallery" data-name="Wolves Art Gallery" data-user-id="51065059" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="patmcfaddenmp apna_heritage anand4560" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;51065059&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;WolvArtGallery&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Wolves Art Gallery&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Wolves Art Gallery&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Wolves Art Gallery&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;25091518&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;patmcfaddenmp&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Pat McFadden&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Pat McFadden&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Pat McFadden&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;757549099080089600&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;apna_heritage&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;ApnaHeritageArchive&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;ApnaHeritageArchive&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;ApnaHeritageArchive&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;390944323&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;anand4560&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Anand Chhabra&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Anand Chhabra&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Anand Chhabra&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We welcomed <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> today as he toured the <a href="/apna_heritage" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="757549099080089600"><s>@</s><b>apna_heritage</b></a> show with <a href="/anand4560" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="390944323"><s>@</s><b>anand4560</b></a>. This fantastic show documents Punjabi migration to the city since the 1960s. So many great photos and images are on display alongside contemporary portraits. See it here until 18 March.<a href="https://t.co/4wJMpYDWwb" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/4wJMpYDWwb</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/patmcfaddenmp" data-user-id="25091518">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Not a surprise because they are both nationalists.<a href="https://t.co/kAHy2YuXNF" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/mikekatz/status/964085859485143040" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/mikekatz/status/964085859485143040"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/mikekatz/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/964085859485143040</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Vote Leave made a Farageist, not *liberal* case for Brexit. Cutting immigration &amp; boosting the NHS is what Johnson, Gove &amp; co. sold to the British people.  Deeply cynical &amp; dishonest for Johnson to try to re-frame Brexit as *liberal* now.<a href="https://t.co/K74nOLOgji" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/K74nOLOgji</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">What would 8% less growth in the West Midlands with an FTA or 12% less with the WTO mean for jobs?  For living standards?  No wonder the Tory Brexiteers were so keen to rubbish their own Governments research.<a href="https://t.co/Js8lfBqAoz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbclaurak/status/961280595233001473" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbclaurak/status/961280595233001473"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbclaurak/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/961280595233001473</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This afternoon I will meet with the UK Coal Authority about the issue of newly identified mineshafts underneath or near properties.  This is a big issue in my constituency and elsewhere in the Black Country.</p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted Beverley Momenabadi</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations to <a href="/beverley_momen" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1166415080"><s>@</s><b>beverley_momen</b></a>.  She will be a great Labour candidate for Ettingshall ward and, if elected, a great Labour councillor.<a href="https://t.co/1aznmNoWlx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/beverley_momen/status/960994330180771844" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/beverley_momen/status/960994330180771844"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/beverley_momen</span><span class="invisible">/status/960994330180771844</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/beverley_momen/status/960994330180771844" data-conversation-id="960994330180771844" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="960994330180771844" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="beverley_momen" data-user-id="1166415080" href="/beverley_momen/status/960994330180771844" data-conversation-id="960994330180771844" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DVYjPheX4AYCEqr.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,53,44,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,53,44]">

</div>

</div>


      </div>
  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Beverley Momenabadi</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>beverley_momen</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">On the day which marks <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>100years</b></span> since the UK got the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>womensvote</b></span> I have been selected to stand as the Labour candidate for MY ward (Ettingshall). Big shoes to fill as Cllr Johnson retires but I will work SO hard for my ward!</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Peter Madeley</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>P_Madeley_Star</b></span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">100 years ago this Act of Parliament, on display today in Central Lobby, extended the franchise to millions of women.  A historic moment on which much progress was built. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/lsDwjCRp2d</span></div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">5</span>

  </button>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">8</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/patmcfaddenmp" data-user-id="25091518">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-959824278349893638">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="959705511653531653" id="stream-item-tweet-959705511653531653" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;959705511653531653&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This is wrong and should not happen.  You win by having the better case.  We must be very careful about what is happening to our democracy.  Scuffle at Rees-Mogg student event at UWE Bristol<a href="https://t.co/55tfZsKeOe" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-bristol-42926535" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-bristol-42926535"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-englan</span><span class="invisible">d-bristol-42926535</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/patmcfaddenmp" data-user-id="25091518">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I am glad that <a href="/SteveBakerHW" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15157283"><s>@</s><b>SteveBakerHW</b></a> will clarify his earlier remarks to the Commons about what was said at the <a href="/prospect_uk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="21417687"><s>@</s><b>prospect_uk</b></a> lunch, and that he accepts the premise of <a href="/Jacob_Rees_Mogg" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="885838630928994304"><s>@</s><b>Jacob_Rees_Mogg</b></a>'s question was false. Also glad to see the aspersion cast on the integrity of HMT staff removed. <a href="/CER_EU" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="233978509"><s>@</s><b>CER_EU</b></a><a href="https://t.co/zM706pQf9G" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SteveBakerHW/status/959155511328468994" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SteveBakerHW/status/959155511328468994"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SteveBakerHW/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/959155511328468994</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Charles Grant added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/SteveBakerHW/status/959155511328468994" data-conversation-id="959155506655973377" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="959155511328468994" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="SteveBakerHW" data-user-id="15157283" href="/SteveBakerHW/status/959155511328468994" data-conversation-id="959155506655973377" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Steve Baker MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>SteveBakerHW</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">3/3 I will apologise to Charles Grant, who is an honest and trustworthy man. As I have put on record many times, I have the highest regard for our hard working civil servants. I will clarify my remarks to the House.</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Clarification re <a href="/Jacob_Rees_Mogg" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="885838630928994304"><s>@</s><b>Jacob_Rees_Mogg</b></a> + <a href="/SteveBakerHW" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15157283"><s>@</s><b>SteveBakerHW</b></a> comments on <a href="/CER_Grant" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="634496564"><s>@</s><b>CER_Grant</b></a>. I did not say or imply that the Treasury had deliberately developed a model to show that all non-customs union options were bad, with the intention to influence policy, <a href="/CER_Grant" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="634496564"><s>@</s><b>CER_Grant</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/eP7PCHrpuH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://shar.es/1NEYQc" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://shar.es/1NEYQc"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">shar.es/1NEYQc</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Political show time tonight on <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="33184246"><s>@</s><b>ITVCentral</b></span> at 22:45 with <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="23129375"><s>@</s><b>Alison1mackITV</b></span>, contributions from <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></span>, <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="595553662"><s>@</s><b>LorelyBurt</b></span>, <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1028318222"><s>@</s><b>KatBoettge</b></span>, David Tredinnick, <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="26584956"><s>@</s><b>GiselaStuart</b></span>. <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="32965648"><s>@</s><b>EmmaReynoldsMP</b></span>, and </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">6</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-959062828543021056">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted The Staggers</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The Tory response to the economic assessment story shows what we already knew: that for them it's not about the economics - it's about nationalist ideology and keeping their right wing onside. My piece attached.<a href="https://t.co/6ogMNCg1XQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/TheStaggers/status/958755067330514947" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/TheStaggers/status/958755067330514947"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/TheStaggers/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/958755067330514947</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/TheStaggers/status/958755067330514947" data-conversation-id="958755067330514947" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="958755067330514947" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="TheStaggers" data-user-id="1565256427" href="/TheStaggers/status/958755067330514947" data-conversation-id="958755067330514947" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">The Staggers</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>TheStaggers</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Pro-Leave MPs are happy to gamble on Brexit, because they know someone else will pay for it, writes <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></span> <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.newstatesman.com/politics/staggers/2018/01/pro-leave-mps-are-happy-gamble-brexit-because-they-know-someone-else-will" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.newstatesman.com/politics/staggers/2018/01/pro-leave-mps-are-happy-gamble-brexit-because-they-know-someone-else-will"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">newstatesman.com/politics/stagg</span><span class="invisible">ers/2018/01/pro-leave-mps-are-happy-gamble-brexit-because-they-know-someone-else-will</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Tories real difficulty with these economic assessments isnt their accuracy or otherwise.  It is that for them this is not about the best economic outcome.  It is about satisfying nationalist ideology and keeping their right wing onside.</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Yesterday in Parliament, <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> raised the issue of PIP claimants and the appeals process. In the last year, every case that he has taken up for constituents has been overturned on appeal. This shows that the system needs to change.<a href="https://t.co/cbQsUmC9GS" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/cbQsUmC9GS</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"I'll tell you what really is unpatriotic. To pursue a policy that will make your country poorer in order to satisfy a right-wing, nationalist ideology," <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> tells a hopelessly unprepared and out of touch Steve Baker.</p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

As time passes more important than ever to remember what hatred can lead to.  Thank you to <a href="/HMD_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="51076040"><s>@</s><b>HMD_UK</b></a> and <a href="/HolocaustUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="236389590"><s>@</s><b>HolocaustUK</b></a><a href="https://t.co/Wfp435gKyU" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Wfp435gKyU</a></p>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  <ul>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted Peter Madeley</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Both <a href="/EmmaReynoldsMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="32965648"><s>@</s><b>EmmaReynoldsMP</b></a> and I spoke in yesterdays Carillion debate.  Still many questions to be answered.  Jobs, provision of public services, pensions, subcontractors, costs to taxpayer and more.<a href="https://t.co/h9BzQmmMOC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/p_madeley_star/status/956256760918106112" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/p_madeley_star/status/956256760918106112"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/p_madeley_star</span><span class="invisible">/status/956256760918106112</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">18</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted Paul Johnson</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Head of IFS on the Brexit dividend - it doesnt exist.<a href="https://t.co/yDVkH9Z7q3" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pjtheeconomist/status/956197619432378368" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pjtheeconomist/status/956197619432378368"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pjtheeconomist</span><span class="invisible">/status/956197619432378368</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/PJTheEconomist/status/956197619432378368" data-conversation-id="956197619432378368" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="956197619432378368" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="PJTheEconomist" data-user-id="3057953574" href="/PJTheEconomist/status/956197619432378368" data-conversation-id="956197619432378368" tabindex="0">

  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Paul Johnson</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>PJTheEconomist</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">New piece on the NHS Brexit dividend. It does not exist. In fact we would need to spend 1bn a year more just to compensate NHS staff for the higher prices already seen since the referendum. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ukandeu.ac.uk/the-brexit-dividend-to-spend-on-the-nhs/?platform=hootsuite" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ukandeu.ac.uk/the-brexit-dividend-to-spend-on-the-nhs/?platform=hootsuite"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ukandeu.ac.uk/the-brexit-div</span><span class="invisible">idend-to-spend-on-the-nhs/?platform=hootsuite</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/1BNiqEAUJ1</span></div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Fantastic <a href="/hashtag/volunteer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>volunteer</b></a> opportunity from the <a href="/RMCentre" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1635264476"><s>@</s><b>RMCentre</b></a> on <a href="/BVSC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25053778"><s>@</s><b>BVSC</b></a>  <a href="/hashtag/CommunityNoticeboard?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CommunityNoticeboard</b></a>! Special thanks to the Chair John Gough, <a href="/EmmaReynoldsMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="32965648"><s>@</s><b>EmmaReynoldsMP</b></a> <a href="/patmcfaddenmp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25091518"><s>@</s><b>patmcfaddenmp</b></a> and the Deputy Mayor Phil Page for coming and cutting the cake! Thanks to all of our Founder Patrons and young people!<a href="https://t.co/ER7Tk9ajYN" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ER7Tk9ajYN</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Pat McFadden Retweeted Jim Pickard</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Would a loan of 150m have saved Carillion?  And what will its collapse cost taxpayers now?<a href="https://t.co/2XZ6lfYb3q" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pickardje/status/954704120786628608" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pickardje/status/954704120786628608"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pickardje/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/954704120786628608</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Pat McFadden added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/PickardJE/status/954704120786628608" data-conversation-id="954704120786628608" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="954704120786628608" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="PickardJE" data-user-id="69080476" href="/PickardJE/status/954704120786628608" data-conversation-id="954704120786628608" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Jim Pickard</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>PickardJE</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Towards the end Carillion executives were asking ministers for 150m loan. In company's final death throes last Sunday they dropped that demand to just 25m to try to keep it alive for a couple more days <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://amp.ft.com/content/27e7153e-fd25-11e7-9b32-d7d59aace167" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://amp.ft.com/content/27e7153e-fd25-11e7-9b32-d7d59aace167"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">amp.ft.com/content/27e715</span><span class="invisible">3e-fd25-11e7-9b32-d7d59aace167</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1112819377"><s>@</s><b>gillplimmer1</b></span> in today's <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18949452"><s>@</s><b>FT</b></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It won't be the 1st Cake John tucks into this season too! Give Mr Gough my regards <a href="/hashtag/WolvesAyWe?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WolvesAyWe</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/WWFC?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WWFC</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/TheWayTurns2?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TheWayTurns2</b></a><a href="https://t.co/Ic2NOzHfyG" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/status/954706084744310784" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/status/954706084744310784"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/patmcfaddenmp/</span><span class="invisible">status/954706084744310784</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kashmire DS Hawker added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
